attributes.action: We consider that Nigel Farage should be elevated to the House of Lords.
attributes.additional_details: I would think that by now, everyone in this country will know of Nigel Farage, not all will agree with what he stands for, but the majority in the recent referendum shows that he is a true man of the common people who deserves recognition for his services.
attributes.background: For many years he has been very much a man alone in the European Parliament, derided, ridiculed and vilified he has consistently stood by his principals and beliefs. He stands alongside some of Britain's greatest leaders and has challenged bullies, hypocrites and those who would put Britain down.
